title: Bodyguard Beast
description: AngeloTwo things should have told me staying in this job was a mistake.How she looked.How she talked.But the inner voice that had always kept me safe and one step ahead was drowned out by the fire in my veins. But getting Involved. Not an option.Even though thinking of her curves kept me awake at night.I'd never guarded a woman before, let alone the Boss's daughter.I didn't need a spitfire minx in my life no matter how beautiful, especially not one with a murderous father.Everything changed when I broke the rules. Now I'm powerless against this stubborn, untameable woman.I have an impossible job.Keep her safe and out of my arms.But it's already too late... I need to take her again, and mark her as mine.A full length standalone enemies to lovers romance with no cheating and guaranteed HEA.
author: Georgia Le Carre
